name: Hanoi Boutique Hotel & Spa
detail: Lucy the person at helpdesk was super amazing and helpful

name: Hanoi La Siesta Premium Hang Be
detail: It was our very first time visiting Vietnam and we decided that Hanoi should be the first city where we should experience. We landed into a warm, summer country with traffic conditions that seemed to be a challenge. As we did not arrange for airport transfer to the hotel, Grab was our saviour. Using Grab in Vietnam was a piece of cake. When we reached our Hotel, La Siesta Premium, I really didn't know what it expect. Immediately 2 staffs came to open the car doors and helped us with our luggage to the lobby. Sin Chow! were the first Vietnamese words I heard from the staffs, in fact, by all of them who were at the lobby. Amazed and overwhelmed, I didn't know what it meant, not to mention how to reply. Everyone was so smiley and friendly. Never I had this sort of welcoming experience at any hotel in any part of the world that I travelled to. We were warmly greeted by Quan, who confirmed our bookings and showed us to our room thereafter. Knowing that it was our first time in Hanoi, Quan provided us tips of the area and gave us recommendations of the must try delicacies. Provided us a map and explained to us clearly of our location and attractions to visit. The rooms were very well decorated and each room felt very clean. Beds were very comfortable with great taste of furniture selections. You realised that the housekeepers paid great attention to details when you see the way the towels and curtains were folded. Endless movies selection from NetFlix and youtube. We booked a one night deluxe on Friday and checked out the following day for Ha long bay tour. We had a separate booking of 4 days 3 night Grand Duplex suites after the cruise when we came back on Sunday. The staffs were incredible. Kudos to Mr Quan and his team members. We were greeted with smiles every day by almost every staff when we walked by. Everyone was very helpful whenever we had doubts about the city. They put in their best to meet our request with late check out and even provi

name: Oakwood Residence Hanoi
detail: Helpful and exceptionally friendly staff with a well-designed layout and luxury amenities (esp. the swimming pool and gym). Very good value for money in terms of service apartments and business hotels in Hanoi.
area: Tay Ho District,Hanoi - View on map

name: Hanoian Central Hotel & Spa
detail: Both the facilities and room in this hotel are excellent, clean, and a great value. The location is perfect in the heart of Old Hanoi. But it truly is the people who work here, who make it the best hotel in Hanoi. They are incredibly helpful, genuine, kind, and work extremely hard to make each visit special. In particular, Kate is an absolute star and has gone above and beyond in her duties from check in to departure to make our trip simply outstanding. When we return to Hanoi, we will be staying here again - highly recommended to all travelers.

name: Lotte Hotel Hanoi
detail: My experience with Lotte Hotel Hanoi has been nothing short of perfect ever since I made the decision to book a room. Everyone at the hotel seems to go out of their way to make your special occasion even better. As soon as I got to the hotel I was blown away by the view. It's one thing to imagine it but it's another thing altogether to get, what is perhaps, the best view in Hanoi from what might be the most luxurious hotel in Hanoi. The service is absolutely impeccable from everyone in the hotel but I do need to specially point out Ms. Ngan, Mr. Dat Tan Nguyen and every one of the Reservation Sales Agents I talked to for doing an exceptional job. They go out of their way to ensure you have the best time possible.

name: Kecho Legacy Hotel & Spa
detail: And lobby staff was amazing, very helpful and always smiling

name: The Hanoi Club Hotel & Residences
detail: The Hanoi Club Hotel is located in the North of Hanoi in reasonable distance between the airport and downtown. The room was excellent, great designed, best features the king size bed and the spacy luxory bathroom. also well, wide screen TV, WiFi, AC. The staff is very friendly, competent and supportive. Every question answered satisfctionally. The breakfast is good to excellent, the room and breakfast staff excellent. The location invites you to real Vietnames urban life, walking at the West Lake, great restaurants and sightseeing points in walking distance. The price is very reasonable for the service you get. also a very nice pool with lake view, a good gym and spa available. The service there incl. towels is also excellent. No comments or prejudices for us as mixed couples Vietnamese/German which we faced in other locations. Yes we will come again!
area: Tay Ho District,Hanoi - View on map

name: The Oriental Jade Hotel
detail: Perfectly situated in the Hanoi old quarter. This is a smaller sized hotel with a more personal touch. It has spotless rooms and extremely helpful staff. The rooftop pool is very pleasant especially in the evening. Breakfast is of the best standard. We also received a fruit bowl each day. The only negative I can think of is the rooftop bar prices are a bit pricy. I would certainly stay there again.
area: Hoan Kiem District,Hanoi - View on map
